long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover resources in your library as you use Google. When you search with Google, related resources from your library, such as books, e-books, DVDs, Blu-ray discs appear in an unobtrusive sidebar alongside your Google results. 
		
Works with libraries that have their catalog online using Surpass Safari and Surpass Cloud OPAC.
